dojo.name: The Proving Grounds
dojo.description: Training for speed. Learn to ship fast, iterate faster.
dojo.entry_ritual: Perfection is the enemy of shipped.

skills.name: Know Your Quiver
skills.description: Know what starters and templates exist
skills.training: Practice: List 10 project starters you could use right now.
skills.mastery_check: Can you name the right starter for any project type?

skills.name: Quick Shot
skills.description: Get something running in under 5 minutes
skills.training: Practice: From zero to running dev server in 5 minutes.

skills.name: Arrow Crafting
skills.description: Modify templates to fit needs quickly
skills.training: Practice: Take a starter and customize it in under 15 minutes.
skills.mastery_check: Can you adapt templates without slowing down?

skills.name: Volley Fire
skills.training: Practice: Try 3 different approaches in 30 minutes.

skills.name: Custom Quiver
skills.training: Practice: Create 5 personal templates for common projects.
skills.mastery_check: Do you have templates for your most common tasks?

skills.name: Trail Signs
skills.description: Quickly extract what you need from documentation
skills.training: Practice: Get a new library working from docs in 10 minutes.
skills.mastery_check: Can you navigate unfamiliar docs efficiently?

skills.name: Infinite Quiver
skills.training: Practice: Have Claude generate a perfect starter for a unique use case.
skills.mastery_check: Can you create templates as fast as you need them?

skills.name: Arrow to Spear
skills.description: Know when and how to evolve prototypes
skills.training: Practice: Take a quick prototype and identify the path to production.
skills.mastery_check: Do you know when to stop ranging and start building?

training_quests.name: The Speed Run
training_quests.description: Prototype 3 different project types in one hour
training_quests.objective: Prove you can scaffold anything quickly

training_quests.name: The Forge
training_quests.objective: Build a reusable starter for your common projects

quick_load: Load ranger dojo. What's my scaffold speed? What templates do I have? Ready to prototype.
